page.title: 15The Chesterfield Canal 2
page.content: The canal enters the study area at {Lady Bridge}and passes under a Railway Bridge,Cemetery Bridge,Woodcock's Bridge,a single lock,Aquaduct,a single lock into the Marina Basin,Carolgate Bridge ,Relief Rd. Bridge,Gas House Bridge,Leverton Rd. Bridge ,Welham Rd. Bridge. The other principle features are Canal Cottage by the Marina lock opposite Navigation Inn(as was).The Packet Inn was a stopping place for {"Packet}Boats" opposite Bridge House.The old Knacker's yard by Leverton Rd. Bridge and the{Maltkiln } opposite were principle features of the industrial past.The maltkiln is now used as a warehouse for Bassetlaw. Eight bridges,one aquaduct several cottages and maltkilns make an interesting{industrail heritage}trail. .
